name: Yuan-ti Pureblood
description: Yuan-ti Purebloods are serpentine humanoids known for their cunning, ambition, and ruthlessness. They are the lowest caste of the Yuan-ti society, but they are still dangerous and deceptive. Purebloods often serve as spies and infiltrators, using their ability to blend in with humans to further the goals of their serpent masters. They possess innate magical abilities and resistance to poison.
languages: You can speak, read, and write Common, Abyssal, and Draconic.
special: Magic Resistance: You have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
